sub_tasks.requirements: Filters for male patients using the condition `p.gender = 'M'`.
Restricts the patient cohort to the age range of 75-85 years using `p.anchor_age BETWEEN 75 AND 85`.

Correctly identifies hospital admissions (`hadm_id`) with a record of BOTH Ischemic Heart Disease/ACS AND COPD using a `GROUP BY hadm_id` and a `HAVING` clause with two distinct `SUM(CASE WHEN ...)` conditions.
Accurately filters for Ischemic Heart Disease/ACS by checking for ICD-9 codes ('410'-'414') and ICD-10 codes ('I20'-'I25') while handling the `icd_version`.
Accurately filters for COPD by checking for ICD-9 codes ('491'-'496') and ICD-10 codes (`J44%`) while handling the `icd_version`.
Correctly joins the `patients` and `admissions` tables on `subject_id` to link demographic data with admission records.
Correctly joins the `admissions` table with the CTE `admissions_with_both_diagnoses` on `hadm_id` to filter for the relevant cohort.
Calculates the length of stay for each admission in days using `DATE_DIFF(DATE(a.dischtime), DATE(a.admittime), DAY)`.
Includes filters to ensure data quality for LOS calculation, such as checking for non-null `admittime` and `dischtime` and ensuring a non-negative duration.
Computes the 75th percentile of the length of stay using `APPROX_QUANTILES(...)[OFFSET (75)]` and rounds the final result.
